frontmatter.mitle: Transgender Man Becomes First Ever to Give Birth as Both Man and Woman
frontmatter.description: A transgender man in Wisconsin became the first person who has given birth as both a man and a woman.

frontmatter.mitle: This Is What Makes You Good in Bed, According to Your Zodiac Sign
frontmatter.description: If you believe in the influence of zodiac signs, you may wonder what they say about your expertise in bed. The answer may teach you something more about yourself.

frontmatter.mitle: Mom, 98, Moves Into Care Home to Look After Her 80-Year-Old Son Because "You Never Stop Being a Mum"
frontmatter.description: It isn’t often that you come across a story of a mother taking care of her son at an old person’s home. This story just goes to show that this is most probably because of a lack of ability for the mother to support the child at an age when she needs all the support herself - if the mother can help her child, she will do everything in her power to do so.

frontmatter.mitle: You Can't Google These 15 Secrets That Will Die With Their Keepers
frontmatter.description: Even Sherlock won’t be able to deduce these secrets.

frontmatter.mitle: 10 Hidden Insecurities That Your Man Have
frontmatter.description: Vulnerability is something men and women both possess but the former is keen on hiding it than the latter. So here is a list that explains why and what those are!

frontmatter.mitle: The Dark and Tragic Tale Behind America's Most Popular Christmas Song
frontmatter.description: Every song has a story behind it, but the story behind this popular song may move you to tears.

frontmatter.mitle: It Is Now Illegal to Declaw a Cat in Denver
frontmatter.description: In a move that has been hailed by animal rights activists, the city of Denver, Colorado has moved to ban the very controversial practice

frontmatter.mitle: Woman Raises More Than $200k for Homeless Man After He Gave Her His Last $20 for Gas in Philadelphia
frontmatter.description: Description: Johnny Bobbitt, a homeless man in the state of Pennsylvania has showed us all that we can still think for other before ourselves. He gave Kate McClure twenty dollars so she could fill her car with gas, even though that was the last 20 dollars that the homeless man had on him. Kate McClure...

frontmatter.mitle: These Mistakes Will Make You Lose the Girl Who Loved You with All Her Heart
frontmatter.description: Subtle mistakes can result in big mishaps during a relationship.

frontmatter.mitle: Should You Pee Before Or After Sex? An Expert Explains Once And For All
frontmatter.description: According to some sexual pundits women should go for peeing after indulging in sexual intercourse on the reason that it minimizes urinary tract infections. This argument is countered with another school of thought that also is more closer to common sense which says the urge to go to bathroom.
